original_title: Tokyo Miracle City: Gourmet Capital - Keeping Alive the Spirit of Tsukiji
overview: In the series Tokyo Miracle City, we unravel the secrets behind some of the capital's most intriguing wonders. In part one, we delve into Tokyo's famed and tantalizing food culture, exploring the role the iconic Tsukiji fish market played in Japan's culinary history. Actor Sato Takeru takes us on a journey back in time as we learn about the lives of the skilled specialists at the heart of the market and discover their unique contribution in the journey of seafood from ocean to table.
title: Tokyo Miracle City: Gourmet Capital - Keeping Alive the Spirit of Tsukiji
